about_the_game:
Embark on a journey to restore order to the Outpost as you control the incredible BOTS against the havoc-wreaking techno insectoids. Join forces with other players in up to 4 player local or online co-op, unleashing melee and ranged attacks, as well as deploying towers and collecting random power-ups. Navigate treacherous environments, using your skills and quick reflexes to triumph over the insectoids.



Build and merge a diverse array of towers, from protective barriers like Block tower to explosive sensations like Rocket launchers. Each tower offers unique abilities, and through merging and strategic placement, you can unleash mayhem. Upgrade both tower and BOTS attributes in the tech tree, experimenting with combinations to discover your favorite strategies.



Whether you're an aggressive front-liner or a strategic defender, adapt your style to stop endless waves of enemies. Test your and your friends' skills with additional party gameplay modes. Engaging for all levels, the game combines accessible mechanics with strategic depth, getting crazier with more players. Immerse yourself in beautiful retro pixel art and groove to a chip-tunes soundtrack that enhances the excitement of every battle.

short_description: Unite in a 1-4 player strategy game fusing tower defense with the thrill of controlling powerful BOTS. Deploy defenses, tweak tower loadout and tech tree. Amp up the party mode with friends. Attack, defend, build – your strategy, your call!
